TopicTitle: Is there a part.cfg for kerbals on EVA?

Articles.Content: Or equivalent way to add resources or modules through text .cfgs rather than C#? (Not afraid of C#, but lazy)
You can try a MM config with @PART[kerbalEVA] as that's the name of the EVA part. Don't know if the changes will take though.

What I'm trying is this:


@PART[kerbalEVA] {
	@MODULE[ModuleScienceExperiment,surfaceSample] {
		xmitDataScalar = 0
	}
}

No joy.

Ah. Dunno then. I only know that because MCE trawls through all availableparts to set costs and logs their IDs, and that's the kerbal EVA ID. I haven't actually tried to do anything to it.

It's possible it's never actually loaded via ConfigNode, and instead loaded directly as a part.
